Description:
You go through a bridge to cross a river of poison but on the next bridge there is a group of poisonous slimes.

To continue you have to get to the other side, so it seems that facing them is the only solution.

You can also try to avoid the bridge and jump directly to the other side, if you fall into the river you can reach the other side by swimming but you will get poisoned.
DescriptionAction: What do you want to do?
